solution_line_template: He breaks {strings_per_night} strings a night for {shows_per_week} nights for a total of {strings_per_night}*{shows_per_week} = <<{strings_per_night}*{shows_per_week}={broken_strings_per_week}>>{broken_strings_per_week} broken strings

He breaks {broken_strings_per_week} strings per week so over {num_weeks} weeks, he will need to replace {broken_strings_per_week}*{num_weeks} = <<{broken_strings_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_strings_needed}>>{total_strings_needed} guitar strings
